name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, and **React** to build high-performance, user-centric solutions. My extensive background in developing **RESTful APIs**, coupled with a strong focus on **frontend testing** and **component-based architecture**, ensures the creation of scalable and accessible applications. I prioritize performance optimization and usability, ensuring seamless user experiences in every project. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in **CI/CD** practices, enabling rapid deployment and integration.

With a proven track record in team leadership and communication, I am adept at guiding cross-functional teams towards achieving project goals. My expertise also extends to problem-solving in complex environments, ensuring that I can effectively address challenges as they arise.

Applied advanced styling techniques to ensure a cohesive visual identity across applications, achieving a **95%** accessibility compliance rate.
Exercised strong problem-solving skills while addressing legacy code challenges, initiating a task force that led to the successful refactoring of **3** major components into a modular architecture for improved maintainability.
Fostered open communication and team leadership, guiding a group of **5** junior developers through the adoption of best practices in frontend development and fostering a collaborative team environment.
